document_data.name: Askulder
document_data.mainbody: '''Askulder''', known as the "Hand of [[Tiamat]]", was the High Suikh (king{{Cite dragon/272/The New Adventures of Volo: Quotations of the Realms|97}}
document_data.Relations: Askulder succeeded his uncle, [[Naether]]. He had a foster daughter, Chansreena (princess) [[Maerildarraine]]. He was attended by the court fool [[Jeremmer Hardree]].
document_data.History: On [[Kythorn 12]] in the [[1306 DR|Year of Thunder, 1306 DR]], High Suikh Askulder was murdered by Chansreena Maerildarraine. She seized the throne and declared herself Queen of Ormpur, then burned the royal temple of Tiamat, triggering a holy war. To Ormpurrans, this shocking day would be known ever afterward as "[[Bloodsword]]".
